name: Shahrazad's Journey
description:
Theme:

Explore the adventures of Shahrazad as she searches for her missing husband. She will encounter fantastical fairy creatures, and countless challenges. Along the way she will learn how to be more adapt in the way of the sword and magic.

Shahrazad keeps a journal diary of her adventures which later became the bases of her One Thousand and One Nights novel.

Game Description:

Shahrazad’s Journey is a 2D Action-Adventure RPG game. You play with adventurer Shahrazad who can navigate stages using her skills and spells.

The stages will have platforming challenges and various enemy types that will hinder your progress. After unlocking new skills and spells, stages can be revisited later to reach hidden and locked areas of the stage that weren’t possible for the player before.

Credits:

This game was done in period of 3 weeks as a Final Project submission for an Online Unity Game Development Bootcamp hosted by Saudi Digital Academy (SDA) and Coding Dojo.
